alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:39AM CDT until July 09 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... West central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... West central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 138 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Norman, or near Goldsby, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, Norman, Newcastle, Noble, Slaughterville, Goldsby, Etowah, Stella, Lake Thunderbird, and Little Axe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
